class.name: BlipKitInstrument
class.brief_description: Changes the output parameters of a [BlipKitTrack] while a note is playing or after it was released.
class.description:
[codeblocks] [gdscript] var instrument := BlipKitInstrument.new() instrument.set_adsr(4, 16, 0.75, 36) instrument.set_envelope(BlipKitInstrument.ENVELOPE_PITCH, [], [12, 0], 1, 1)
var track := BlipKitTrack.new() track.instrument = instrument track.note = BlipKitTrack.NOTE_A_2 [/gdscript] [/codeblocks]

method.name: get_envelope_steps
method.description: Returns the steps for the envelope with [param type]. Returns an empty array if the envelope is not set or no steps are set.

method.name: get_envelope_sustain_length
method.description: Returns the length of the sustain cycle. Returns [code]0[/code] if the envelope is not set.

method.name: get_envelope_sustain_offset
method.description: Returns the offset of the sustain cycle. Returns [code]0[/code] if the envelope is not set.

method.name: get_envelope_values
method.description: Returns the values for the envelope with [param type]. Returns an empty array if the envelope is not set.

method.name: has_envelope
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if an envelope with [param type] was set.

method.name: set_adsr
method.description: Initializes the [constant ENVELOPE_VOLUME] envelope with an ADSR envelope. On attack, raises the volume to [code]1.0[/code] within [param attack] ticks, then lowers it to [param sustain] within [param decay] ticks where it is kept until the note is released. On release, the volume is lowered to [code]0.0[/code] within [param release] ticks. This corresponds to the following call: [codeblocks] [gdscript] instrument.set_envelope(BlipKitInstrument.ENVELOPE_VOLUME, [attack, decay, 240, release], [1.0, sustain, sustain, 0.0], 2, 1) [/gdscript] [/codeblocks]

method.name: set_envelope
method.description: Sets the envelope with [param type]. [param values] define the individual values for each step. If [param steps] is empty, [param values] is used as a sequence. In this case, the duration of each value is defined with [member BlipKitTrack.instrument_divider]. The values [param sustain_offset] and [param sustain_length] define the range of the sustain cycle which is repeated while the note is playing.

constants.constant: Changes the output value of [member BlipKitTrack.volume] by multiplying it with values from the envelope.
Changes the output value of [member BlipKitTrack.panning] by adding values from the envelope.
Changes the output value of [member BlipKitTrack.note] by adding values from the envelope.

Changes the output value of [member BlipKitTrack.duty_cycle] by overriding it with values from the envelope. If an envelope value is [code]0[/code], [member BlipKitTrack.duty_cycle] is not changed. [b]Node:[/b] Values are cast to integers and clamped between [code]0[/code] and [code]15[/code].
